None.Name: Fiery Spit
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit hurls a magma ball that deals 480 damage to enemies in a 10m radius around its target, up to 720 in total. Knocks back small and medium units.

None.Name: Earthquake
None.Description: Activate to trigger a groundshaking quake that deals 850 damage to enemies every 2 seconds for 6 seconds. Knocks back small, medium and large units. Reusable every 30 seconds.

None.Name: Percussive Birth
None.Description: When being spawned unit knocks back small, medium and large units dealing additionally 500 damage to enemy units in target area, up to 2000 in total. Affects ground targets only.

None.Name: Earth Dive
None.Description: While moving around unit takes 50% less damage and knocks back small and medium units dealing additionally 250 damage to enemy units in target area, up to 1000 in total. Affects ground targets only.
